text: Alitet Leaves for the Hills () is a 1949 Soviet drama movie directed by Mark Donskoy.АЛИТЕТ УХОДИТ В ГОРЫАлитет уходит в горы (1950) It stars Andrei Abrikosov, Lev Sverdlin, and Boris Tenin. == Actors == * Andrei Abrikosov as Nikita Sergeevich Los (as A. Abrikosov) * Lev Sverdlin as Alitet (as L. Sverdlin) * Boris Tenin as Charlie Thomson (as B. Tenin) * Yuri Leonidov as Frank (as Yu. Leonidov) * Lenvlad Turkin as Andrey Zhukov (as L. Turkin) * Muratbek Ryskulov as Vaal (as M. Ryskulov) == References == ==Other websites== * Category:1949 drama movies Category:Soviet drama movies Category:Movies directed by Mark Donskoy
title: Alitet Leaves for the Hills
